input.sentences: arriving for our day at the lake | all the family gathering .
and the apples are ready to pick and take home for canning .
a visit to the lake would n't be complete without fishing .
heading to the sit on the front porch and enjoy the peace of the day .
a complete and lovely vacation day sitting and watch the water in the lake and the clouds drifting in the water .
output.sentences: Every Autumn, the family gathers at the lake.
They always bring the last fruit picked from home.
The family loves to visit the lake to go fishing.
The house has a porch to sit in peach near the water.
The best vacation is to watch the water.
